name: df-mu
body: |- wceq(cmu, cmpt(s0, cn, cif(nat0, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cfv(chash, crab(s1, cprime, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, cv(s0))))), wrex(s1, cprime, wbr(co(cv(s1), cexp, nat2), cdvds, cv(s0))))))
comment: Define the Möbius function, which is zero for non-squarefree numbers and is ` -u 1 ` or ` 1 ` for squarefree numbers according as to the number of prime divisors of the number is even or odd, see definition in [ApostolNT] p. 24. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2014.)
